title: Num Meth-Part Diff Eqns
description: Introduction to the implementation and analysis of numerical algorithms for the numerical solution of the classic partial differential equations of science and engineering. Must have knowledge of a computer programming language, familiarity with partial differential equations and elements of scientific computing.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 4347 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MATH 4640 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
